name: Exorcist's Tonfa
loreDescription: A powerful tonfa capable of smashing bones and splitting flesh. They say that when the wielders of this weapon dies, their souls are bound to it.

skillDescription.base: Increases damage dealt by 8.0% when the enemy's Health is more than 50%.
skillDescription.max: Increases damage dealt by 16.0% when the enemy's Health is more than 50%.
